nodes.bodyText: @utle In the description, could you be a little more descriptive about what the authentication filter reference is?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -30,3 +30,7 @@ expiration.desc=Amount of time after which a token expires in minutes.
 
 ltpa.monitorInterval=LTPA token keys file polling rate
 ltpa.monitorInterval.desc=Rate at which the server checks for updates to the LTPA token keys file.
+
+authFilterRef=Authentication Filter Reference
+authFilterRef$Ref=Authentication filter reference
+authFilterRef.desc=Specifies the authentication filter reference.

nodes.bodyText: We have 7 other features mpJwt, saml.sso ...etc. that have the same authFilterRef.desc. Should we keep them the same?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -30,3 +30,7 @@ expiration.desc=Amount of time after which a token expires in minutes.
 
 ltpa.monitorInterval=LTPA token keys file polling rate
 ltpa.monitorInterval.desc=Rate at which the server checks for updates to the LTPA token keys file.
+
+authFilterRef=Authentication Filter Reference
+authFilterRef$Ref=Authentication filter reference
+authFilterRef.desc=Specifies the authentication filter reference.

nodes.bodyText: Unless the user has to know more this authentication filter reference, then what you have is sufficient.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -30,3 +30,7 @@ expiration.desc=Amount of time after which a token expires in minutes.
 
 ltpa.monitorInterval=LTPA token keys file polling rate
 ltpa.monitorInterval.desc=Rate at which the server checks for updates to the LTPA token keys file.
+
+authFilterRef=Authentication Filter Reference
+authFilterRef$Ref=Authentication filter reference
+authFilterRef.desc=Specifies the authentication filter reference.

nodes.bodyText: There is a authFilter element that has all the description.
